items.summary: Add a “Leadership” section on the Home page listing these roles and names: Founder/CEO: SYED IRFAN ALI; Vice President: Md Rayyan Malik; President: Md Zaid Uddin. Store this leadership data in the centralized content config so it can be edited without changing page components.

Reflect the requested public website name/URL "https://www.iqratultajweedonlinequranacademy.com" in site branding by adding it to centralized site content and rendering it in at least one obvious location in the UI (e.g., footer and/or Contact page) as a clickable link.

Add documentation describing how to point a custom domain (https://www.iqratultajweedonlinequranacademy.com) to the Internet Computer deployment, including the fact that domain/DNS configuration is done outside the app and the deployed canister URL will still work independently.

Add the Arabic Bismillah text “بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ” to the Home page in a prominent, visually respectful placement (e.g., above the main hero title), ensuring it renders correctly on mobile and desktop.
